title.rendered: “Etzion Brigade Thwarts Terror Attack: Inside the Dramatic Pursuit and Neutralization”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

At the end of a pursuit, the defenders from all over the Etzion Brigade eliminated two terrorists who broke through a barrier and fired towards them.

A short time ago, a Palestinian vehicle broke through a military barrier near the fortress in the Judean hills of the Etzion Brigade and escaped.

The force pursued the terrorists’ vehicle during which the terrorists fired at the forces, the soldiers returned fire and eliminated them. At the scene, the weapon used by the terrorists, a hammer and ammunition were found.

Attached is a picture of the weapon used by the terrorists: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC14012024.527
